x-kubernetes-validations.message: name is required when from is 'Name' or default
name is required when from is 'Name' or default
bool is required when type is Bool, and forbidden otherwise
number is required when type is Number, and forbidden otherwise
string is required when type is String, and forbidden otherwise
at least one of flavor or flavorID must be set
spec is required if bastion is enabled
bastion floating IP cannot be set when disableExternalNetwork is true
disableAPIServerFloatingIP cannot be false when disableExternalNetwork is true
